reviews.review_msg: one of the most theatrical teachers I have ever had, which makes the class very interesting and always entertaining!.. I learned more in this class then in the last 2 years at SFU. Marking is tough but fair, I highly recommend taking any classes he teaches.

Janet is unpersonable, unfriendly, narrow minded and rude. Her facilitation of the course is disappointing. Rather than encouraging participation and discussion during seminars she can be sharp and condescending thus inhibiting one from wanting to speak up.
